name: Who We Where
description:
Team: Shift+Delete

How to play

#To unlock Locker require player more than 1  on The Pedal 

#In Last room player have to find 3 items that required

Player1 :walk (W,A,S,D) Action(E)

Player2 :walk(UP,DOWN,LEFT,RIGHT) Action(Keypad 0)  

Goal : Find the way to escape this place
